doc.title: NNTP

value.content: NNTP (Network News Transfer Protocol) is a protocol used to transfer Usenet messages from client to server or between servers.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• NNTP at Wikipedia
  • From the IETF: RFC 3977 about NNTP (2006)
